subject: Copies
body:
Tired with your sexual problems? Looking for an effective and cheap solution?
Our site
We have pills for any disease: ED, Weight loss, Antibiotics etc. Instant shipping, perfect support!
Order now!
There is no need to have a prescription, just visit our store and buy the pills you want.
With best regards,
Heather Madden
 
 
Po oshchushcheniiam v eto vremia liudi na Nove-2 Zakanchivaiut rabotu i idut domoj otdyhat Neizmennoe tuskloe osveshchenie Razdrazhalo. On vsegda mechtal Ob etom. Ia kivnul. Esli s formalnostiami pokoncheno, to ia gotov pristupit K obucheniiu. 
Zato ochen dejstvennyj, hmyknul korotyshka. Ee uzhe bespokoila drugaia mysl, vyzvavshaia vdrug holodnyj oznob. Mech, kstati, byl na meste. S lica gradom Katil edkij solenyj pot, rubashka pod kurtkoj promokla naskvoz i merzko Prilipla k telu, nogi podgibalis ot perenesennogo napriazheniia. V pervuiu ochered o tom, chto on ochen silnoe i neuiazvimoe Sushchestvo, vrode Celitelia. I vot tolko sejchas, kogda pristup Ejforii ot stol nezhdannoj i radostnoj vstrechi s Nori proshel, mne pokazalos Strannym, chto do sih por ona ne pospeshila mne navstrechu. Ia uzhe i zabyl o tom incidente. Mest za Dosa iskliuchalas, tak kak shefir sam prishil Svoego osevogo. 
Ia dejstvitelno Izmenilsia, i ne tolko v fiziologicheskom plane. I esli net, to pust peniaet na sebia. V tot zhe moment Bigman shvyrnul mne odin iz dvuh shestov. Ia zahripel ot podstupaiushchego udushia, v glazah potemnelo, no Ia byl schastliv, chto pokidaiu etot mir. ejisuminyon Q1FUW1pVckRcUFBGHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
